timeline.author: RickHawesUSDS

timeline.bodyText: A question... I'm wondering if this will include x-request-id and authorization.
timeline.author: RickHawesUSDS

replies.bodyText: Headers aren't included by default, but we can specify any that we need to keep track of. Configuration options: https://www.dropwizard.io/en/stable/manual/configuration.html#json-access-log-layout
replies.author: em1

timeline.message: Set JSON layout on consent service request logs
